statements: SELECT * FROM music_venues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM music_venues;
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM music_venues WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM music_venues WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM music_venues ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_venues WHERE location = 'New York' AND capacity >= 500 ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM music_venues WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM music_venues ORDER BY location ASC, venue_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_venues, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM music_venues WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM music_venues WHERE capacity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location ASC, venue_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_venues;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM music_venues WHERE venue_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT venue_name, venue_capacity FROM music_venues ORDER BY venue_capacity DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue_name FROM event_schedule JOIN music_venues ON event_schedule.venue_id = music_venues.venue_id;
SELECT venue_name, venue_location FROM music_venues WHERE venue_capacity > 500 ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM event_schedule INNER JOIN music_venues ON event_schedule.venue_id = music_venues.venue_id WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_venues WHERE venue_name LIKE 'Rose%' AND venue_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, venue_location FROM event_schedule INNER JOIN music_venues ON event_schedule.venue_id = music_venues.venue_id WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, venue_location FROM event_schedule INNER JOIN music_venues ON event_schedule.venue_id = music_venues.venue_id GROUP BY venue_location HAVING total_events > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, date FROM events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, event_id, booked_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'confirmed';
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, date, venue_name FROM events JOIN venues ON events.venue_id = venues.venue_id;
SELECT * FROM venues ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT venue_id, venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT booking_status, booking_id FROM bookings WHERE booked_date >= '2022-01-01' AND booked_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT venue_name, location, count(*) AS total_events FROM venues v INNER JOIN events e ON v.venue_id = e.venue_id GROUP BY venue_name, location;
SELECT event_name, date, venue_name FROM events e INNER JOIN venues v ON e.venue_id = v.venue_id WHERE date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Venue;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM Venue ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, capacity FROM Venue WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY venue_name;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM Contact WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Venue WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY venue_name DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM Venue WHERE location LIKE 'New%' AND capacity >= 200;
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_name FROM Event JOIN Venue ON Event.venue_id = Venue.venue_id WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM Contact WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT venue_name, event_name, available_capacity FROM Venue JOIN Availability ON Venue.venue_id = Availability.venue_id JOIN Event ON Availability.event_id = Event.event_id WHERE available_capacity > 0 ORDER BY venue_name, event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MusicVenues;
SELECT venue_name, location FROM MusicVenues WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE date = '2023-07-15';
SELECT event_name, date, venue_name FROM Events JOIN MusicVenues ON Events.venue_id = MusicVenues.venue_id;
SELECT event_name, rating, comment FROM Events JOIN Reviews ON Events.event_id = Reviews.event_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM MusicVenues WHERE capacity > 500 AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT event_name, date, venue_name FROM Events JOIN MusicVenues ON Events.venue_id = MusicVenues.venue_id WHERE Events.date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT coordinator_name, email, phone_number FROM Coordinators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT event_id, COUNT(coordinator_id) AS num_coordinators FROM EventCoordinators GROUP BY event_id HAVING num_coordinators > 1;
SELECT event_name, rating, comment FROM Events JOIN Reviews ON Events.event_id = Reviews.event_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, event_name ASC;
